document_data.mainbody:
oares was a thug in Phlan in 1489 DR.
Soares was a charming and sure-of-himself individual. He indulged in compliments if they gave him an advantage over others. He was afraid to deceive his new masters however.
Soares was a thug and a mercenary in Phlan until he was recruited by the Cult of the Dragon. One of his first missions in 1489 DR was to silence an adventuring party hired to recover some stolen books but he was defeated and killed.
